skillTree.name: Barded Nightmare
skillTree.description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

skillTree.name: Hellsteed
skillTree.description: Hellsteeds are vicious. Vampires that dabble in the binding of beasts delight in breaking these wild creatures to their will.

skillTree.name: Zombie Dragon
skillTree.description: It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Cynosure
skillTree.description: See the future, change the present.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

skillTree.name: Nehekhara's Noble Blood
skillTree.description: The dark secrets of Necromantic lore can be found in the cursed scrolls hidden within the lairs of the oldest Vampire Lords of the Necrarch family.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek"
Spell number of uses: +2 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +3 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Beguile
skillTree.description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

skillTree.name: Quickblood
skillTree.description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Dark Protection
skillTree.description: Those who watch proceedings from behind the veil of death may reach through to aid their disciples, when required to intervene.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Curse of Undeath
skillTree.description: As the powers of Dark Magic are wielded for the purpose of Necromancy, its unwholesome energies invigorate the Undead.

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Raise Dead Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "The Purple Sun of Xereus"
Overcast spell: "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "The Purple Sun of Xereus"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Purple Sun of Xereus"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing

skillTree.name: Greater Arcane Conduit
skillTree.description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.name: The Unliving Host
skillTree.description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee attack: +8 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee defence: +8 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear itâ€¦ the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

effects.description: Speed: +6% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Speed: +9% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Charge bonus: +6 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Speed: +12% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units

skillTree.name: Evil Souls
skillTree.description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 5% for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Melee attack: +4 for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Spell resistance: 10% for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Melee attack: +8 for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Spell resistance: 15% for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Night
skillTree.description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Weapon strength: +6% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Charge bonus: +9 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Weapon strength: +12% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Charge bonus: +12 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units

skillTree.name: Waking Dead
skillTree.description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Armour: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Melee attack: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Armour: +12 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Melee attack: +8 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units

skillTree.name: Carriages of Death
skillTree.description: By their very nature, most Vampires try to avoid discomfort and travel in style.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Speed: +6% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Melee defence: +6 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Speed: +12% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Melee defence: +8 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units

skillTree.name: Legions of Dead
skillTree.description: "â€¦and the legions of the dead envoked all hell upon the world."

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
Spell resistance: 15% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Dread Knights
skillTree.description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +12% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
Ward save: 8% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Deadly Power
skillTree.description: The power of death cannot be denied.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Flying Horrors
skillTree.description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10% after winning a battle

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
